general.description: Bolero is one of the empire's most successful planets. The population is prosperous and successful, and the planet's conditions are mild. Although it is still treated as something of a backwater, it is becoming increasingly important in Imperial politics.
general.bar: The bar here is an old-Earth style pub, with a low ceiling, warm beer and good food. The atmosphere is warm and welcoming, the cliÃ«nts are all polite and cheerful and the bouncers barely loom at all.
